ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Robust, reliable and flexible paths to files below a project root. The 'root' of a project is defined as a directory that matches a certain criterion, e.g., it contains a certain regular file.
Robust, reliable and flexible paths to files below a project root. The 'root' of a project is defined as a directory that matches a certain criterion, e.g., it contains a certain regular file.

name: r-rprojroot
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.1.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-rprojroot
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/rprojroot_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/rprojroot/rprojroot_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 473989bbef45fd9cd68f68dc317b14c9f42de5cea4b55fd6ba9011f25e0517e9

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('rprojroot')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('rprojroot')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/krlmlr/rprojroot, https://krlmlr.github.io/rprojroot
  license: MIT
  summary: Robust, reliable and flexible paths to files below a project root. The 'root' of a project is defined as a directory that matches a certain criterion, e.g., it contains a certain regular file.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
